title: Elmer's Swirl Glam Glitter Glue, 0.36 Oz. Each, 31 count
description: Brighten every day by adding an EXPLOSIVE pop of sparkle to slime and art projects with elmer’s Rainbow glitter glue pens featuring 31 sparkly glitter pens, you can Personalize your slime with an endless range of shades. Trusted by parents and teachers, elmer’s school glue has a washable, no-run, nontoxic and safe formula. And, using the glitter pens to make glue slime is easy - just follow the kid-friendly recipe on the back of the package. Extra sparkle and shine isn’t just for slime. Elmer’s glitter pens are great for drawings, posters and school projects. From customizing slime to accenting art, elmer’s Rainbow glitter glue pens deliver hours of fun for the classroom and home.
